metadata.dc:title: Shame(s). Disorganizations and organizations of shameful affects
metadata.dc:creator: Zilkha, Nathalie
metadata.dc:description: The autor, on the basis of the central characteristics of the process of adolescence, reflects on the transformation of shameful experiences during this stage of life, on their disorganization and reorganization. Emphasis is placed on its contributions to the traumatic character of shame and its impact on the narcissism of the subject. A passive facet in form of the emergence of pubertal, genital and pregenital drives, and the remodeling of identifications are considered (AU)
metadata.dc:source: Rev. psicopatol. salud ment. niño adolesc;(19): 59-65, abr. 2012.
metadata.dc:title: Vergüenza(s). Desorganización y organización de los afectos vergonzosos
